changeSet.author: Sami Haroon Khan
Sami Haroon Khan
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `users_schema`.`users` ADD COLUMN `id_doc_front_url` TINYTEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `role_id`, ADD COLUMN `id_doc_back_url` TINYTEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `id_doc_front_url`, ADD COLUMN `identification_verified` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT false AFTER `id_doc_back_url`;
